body: I meant that you should use the fast versions everywhere, not only in here. BTW it's not correct until you do `THPObjectPtr fast_sequence {PySequence_Fast(sequence)};`. Then you can use `fast_sequence` as an argument to those functions. The way it's written right now is unsafe (can segfault I think).
